meta.title: ForgeFit - Track All 4 Pillars of Fitness
meta.description: The all-in-one platform that tracks all 4 essential pillars of fitness: Training, Nutrition, Hydration, and Sleep—with AI coaching in 11 languages.

hero.title: YOUR ALL-IN-ONE
hero.subtitle: You need a coach that keeps you accountable. Most fitness apps give you generic workouts and hope for the best. ForgeFit is different.

problem.text: ForgeFit is an all-in-one platform that tracks and optimizes all four essential pillars of fitness: workouts, nutrition, hydration, and sleep - because real results come from balance, not just gym time.
problem.subtext: It delivers personalized 52-week programs that adapt to your progress, helping you build consistency across all four pillars and reach your goals at an accessible price.

emotional.title:
THE #1 REASON PEOPLE FAIL
ISN'T LACK OF MOTIVATION.
emotional.quote: It's lack of accountability. Most people know what to do. They just don't do it consistently. That's where we come in. We track your compliance in real-time, show you exactly where you stand, and keep you honest. Not because we're watching—because you deserve to see your progress.
emotional.subtext: This isn't about perfection. It's about showing up. Day after day. Week after week. Until showing up becomes who you are.

aiPersonalization.title: AI-Powered Personalization
aiPersonalization.desc: Based on 60 different user profiles spanning body types, fitness levels, goals, and equipment access. Your program is built from the ground up for YOU.

accountability.title: Real-Time Accountability
accountability.desc: Track compliance across workouts, nutrition, hydration, and sleep. We keep you honest. Miss a workout? We know. Crush your week? We celebrate it.

nutrition.title: Complete Nutrition Guidance
nutrition.desc: Personalized nutrition coaching that respects your diet (pescatarian, vegetarian, vegan) and adapts to your culture with meals in 11 languages.

coach.title: 24/7 AI Coach Chat
coach.desc: Stuck on form? Not sure what to eat? Need to swap an exercise? Just ask. Always available when you need it. No waiting. No scheduling.

pillars.label: Why ForgeFit is Different
pillars.title:
ONE PLATFORM.
ALL FOUR PILLARS.
pillars.subtitle: Most apps track one thing. We track everything that matters—plus give you a 24/7 AI coach to guide you through it all.

workouts.title: Workouts
workouts.desc: 52-week progressive programs tailored to your body, goals, and equipment. 5,700+ exercises with video demonstrations.

nutrition.title: Nutrition
nutrition.desc: Meal logging is a breeze. Just type in natural language what you ate, and we'll figure out the nutrition. AI-powered meal planning that respects your diet and culture.

hydration.title: Hydration
hydration.desc: Track your daily water intake with smart reminders. Stay hydrated for optimal performance and recovery.

sleep.title: Sleep
sleep.desc: Log your sleep to track recovery. Connect wearables for automatic tracking. Sleep quality impacts everything.

pillars.coachDesc: Stuck on form? Not sure what to eat? Need to swap an exercise? Just ask. Your AI coach knows your program, progress, and goals—always available to guide you.

mealLogging.label: Natural Language Meal Logging
mealLogging.title:
MEAL LOGGING
IS A BREEZE.
mealLogging.subtitle: No more searching through databases. Just type what you ate in natural language, and our AI figures out the nutrition.
mealLogging.demoInput: I had grilled chicken breast with brown rice and steamed broccoli for lunch
mealLogging.footer: Works in 11 languages. Respects your diet preferences. Adapts to your culture. It's that simple.

wowFeatures.label: Built For Everyone
wowFeatures.title:
YOUR BODY.
YOUR LIFE STAGE.
YOUR PROGRAM.
wowFeatures.subtitle: A 25-year-old beginner and a 55-year-old intermediate need completely different approaches. ForgeFit understands the research and adapts to you.

ageAware.title:
50+ & 60+
Specialized
ageAware.desc: Research shows age affects muscle protein synthesis, hormone levels, and recovery. We don't give everyone the same plan. Your program adapts to your age with appropriate volume, intensity, and recovery protocols.
ageAware.highlight: Science-backed: Special protocols for 50-59 and 60+ age groups with modified intensity and extended recovery.

pregnancy.title:
Pregnancy
Fitness
pregnancy.desc: Safe, modified workouts that adapt to your trimester. Nutrition guidance that supports both you and your baby. Track your fitness journey through pregnancy and beyond.
pregnancy.highlight: Trimester-aware: Workouts and nutrition plans that adjust automatically based on your stage of pregnancy.

photoAnalysis.title:
Photo Body
Analysis
photoAnalysis.desc: Upload 3 photos. Our AI analyzes your body composition, muscle development, and posture—no gym assessment needed. Get personalized recommendations based on what your body actually looks like.
photoAnalysis.highlight: GPT-4 Vision: Advanced AI that sees your body composition, posture, and fitness level from photos. Face blur for privacy.

cultural.title:
Cultural
Adaptation
cultural.desc: Meal plans that respect your culture. Get recipes in 11 languages with local cuisine. Indian, Mexican, Mediterranean, Asian—your meals, your way.
cultural.highlight: Local cuisine: Not just translated—actually adapted. Indian dal, Mexican tacos, Japanese bento boxes, all with proper macros.

offline.title:
Train
Anywhere
offline.desc: No internet? No problem. All workouts, exercises, and meal plans work completely offline. Sync when you're back online. Your progress never stops.
offline.highlight: 100% offline: 5,700+ exercise videos, all workout plans, and meal suggestions available without internet.

videoCoverage.title:
Never
Wonder How
videoCoverage.desc: With 99.98% video coverage across 5,700+ exercises, you'll never be stuck wondering how to perform a movement. Every exercise has a video demonstration.
videoCoverage.highlight: HD videos: Professional demonstrations for virtually every exercise. Form cues, common mistakes, and alternatives included.

statement.subtext: Our AI analyzes your body, goals, experience, and available equipment—then builds a complete 52-week program designed specifically for you. No templates. No guesswork. Just results.

programs.title: 52-Week Programs
programs.desc: Progressive programming tailored to your goals. 5,700+ exercise library with 99.98% video coverage. Never wonder how to perform a movement.

mealPlanning.title: AI Meal Planning
mealPlanning.desc: Respects your diet and culture. Get meals in 11 languages with local cuisine. Real-time compliance tracking and accountability.

analytics.title: Progress Analytics
analytics.desc: Body composition tracking, photo progress with face blur for privacy, and detailed analytics to see your transformation.

testimonials.label: Real Results
testimonials.title:
WHAT USERS
ARE SAYING
testimonials.subtitle: People are seeing real results. Not because of motivation—because of accountability.

testimonial1.text: I've tried every fitness app. This is the first one that actually keeps me accountable. The AI coach knows my program and calls me out when I skip workouts. Down 15 pounds in 12 weeks.
testimonial1.name: Sarah M.

testimonial2.text: At 58, I thought I was too old to start. The age-specific programming is incredible. My coach adjusts everything for my recovery. I'm stronger now than I was at 40.
testimonial2.name: Robert J.

testimonial3.text: The meal logging is a game changer. I just type 'chicken and rice' and it figures everything out. No more searching through databases. And the cultural meals? Perfect for my Indian diet.
testimonial3.name: Priya K.

testimonial4.text: The 4-pillar tracking is what makes this different. I can see my hydration, sleep, workouts, and nutrition all in one place. The AI coach connects the dots and tells me why I'm not recovering.
testimonial4.name: Marcus C.

testimonial5.text: I'm 6 months pregnant and the pregnancy-safe workouts are perfect. My coach adjusts everything automatically. I feel strong and confident, and I know I'm doing the right things for me and my baby.
testimonial5.name: Emma L.

testimonial6.text: The photo body analysis was mind-blowing. Uploaded 3 photos and got a complete program. No gym assessment, no trainer needed. The AI saw things I didn't even know about my posture.
testimonial6.name: David T.

cta.title: YOUR AI COACH IS WAITING.
cta.subtitle: 7-day free trial. Then just $3.99/month or $19.99/year. Download ForgeFit and begin your transformation today.

footer.description: The all-in-one platform for tracking all 4 pillars of fitness. Built for results, powered by AI.

comingSoon.title: Coming Soon!
comingSoon.message: We're putting the finishing touches on ForgeFit. Stay tuned for updates on when the app will be available for download.

intro.title: You Don't Need Another Workout App
intro.text:
You don't need another workout app. You need a coach that keeps you accountable.

Most fitness apps give you generic workouts and hope for the best. ForgeFit is different. Our AI analyzes your body, goals, experience, and available equipment—then builds a complete 52-week program designed specifically for you. And when you have questions? Your AI coach is right there, ready to help—24/7.

aiCoach.title: YOUR AI COACH, ALWAYS AVAILABLE
aiCoach.text: Stuck on form? Not sure what to eat before a workout? Need to swap an exercise? Just ask. ForgeFit's AI coach gives you real-time guidance through chat—always available when you need it. No waiting. No scheduling. Just answers, whenever you need them.

accountability.title: ACCOUNTABILITY THAT DRIVES RESULTS
accountability.text: The #1 reason people fail isn't lack of motivation—it's lack of accountability. ForgeFit tracks your compliance in real-time, shows you exactly where you stand, and keeps you honest. Miss a workout? We know. Crush your week? We celebrate it. This isn't passive tracking. This is a coach that pays attention.

personalization.title: AI-POWERED PERSONALIZATION
personalization.text: ForgeFit's AI doesn't guess—it learns. Based on 60 different user profiles spanning body types, fitness levels, goals, and equipment access, your program is built from the ground up for YOU. With 99.98% video coverage across 5,700+ exercises, you'll never be stuck wondering how to perform a movement. As you progress, your workouts adapt. Plateaus don't stand a chance.

analytics.title: PROGRESS ANALYTICS THAT MATTER
analytics.text: See your transformation unfold with detailed analytics—strength gains, volume trends, body composition changes, and compliance scores. Track progress photos over time and watch your body change week by week. Real data. Real results. No guesswork.

nutrition.title: COMPLETE NUTRITION GUIDANCE
nutrition.text: Training is only half the equation. ForgeFit delivers personalized nutrition coaching that fits your lifestyle—whether you're building muscle, cutting fat, or optimizing performance. Respects your diet (pescatarian, vegetarian, vegan) and adapts to your culture with meals in 11 languages. Macros, meal timing, and guidance that actually makes sense.

features.title: EVERYTHING YOU NEED
list: Real-time AI coach chat—ask anything, anytime
52-week progressive programming tailored to your goals
5,700+ exercise library with video demonstrations (99.98% coverage)
Real-time compliance tracking and accountability across all four pillars
Progress analytics and body composition tracking
Photo progress tracking with face blur for privacy
